name: vungle-dynamo-tpl-imagenative
description: Image Native template used for uploading adunitconfig.json to advertiser dashboard

scripts.pipeline: if [ ! -d "node_modules/vungle-dynamo-core" ]; then npm install --production; fi && if [ ! -d "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/vungle-dynamo-cli" ]; then npm install -g git+ssh://git@bitbucket.org:vungle_creative_labs/vungle-dynamo-cli.git#v1.8.0; fi && node /usr/local/lib/node_modules/vungle-dynamo-cli/src/index.js validate
